title: Virtual Love Affair
description: Virtual Love Affair is the first of a series of short erotic stories by Amanda Carrington.Tania Fye has carved a fabulous career for herself as one of the UK's largest distributors in the Sex Toy Industry.She's classy, she's sassy and fiercely independent. This lover of high heels with her signature seamed stockings and Coco Chanel refuses to commit to any one man, Tania has a string of lovers whom she divides her time between.Here are the diaries of the encounters between Tania and her five men George, Steve Collins, Guy Eddison, Rick Sneider and Richard Tyson. Who will eventually win her heart? And what will happen when she is forced to make a decision?
author: Amanda Carrington
